name: 2-pack sports tops
description: Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Long-sleeved top in fast-drying functional mesh with good air permeability to wick away moisture and help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Rounded and slightly longer at the back with a reflective print above the hem. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Long-sleeved top in fast-drying functional mesh with good air permeability to wick away moisture and help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Rounded and slightly longer at the back with a reflective print above the hem. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

name: Sports trousers
description: Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs with cuffed hems.

name: Padded hooded jacket
description: Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

name: Sports top Muscle Fit
description: Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.

name: Thermal longjohns
description: Thermal longjohns in marled functional fabric with an elasticated waist and flatlock seams.

name: Sports socks
description: Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a ribbed, ankle-height shaft with a jacquard-patterned motif. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.

name: Water-repellent shell jacket
description: Shell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring at either side, a taped zip down the front with a chin guard, and long sleeves with an adjustable tab and fastener at the cuffs. Chest pocket and two front pockets, all with a flap and concealed press-studs, plus a second chest pocket with a taped zip, outer compartment with a flap and several smaller inner compartments. Inside this pocket there is a small plastic carabiner hook attached to sewn-in grosgrain for you to secure your keys to. Concealed elasticated drawstring at the hem and reflective prints on the pockets and sleeves. Lining with taped seams.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.

name: Hooded sports jacket
description: Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

name: Sports joggers
description: Sports joggers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

name: Sports trousers
description: Sports trousers with reflective details, an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip and tapered legs.

name: Padded outdoor jacket
description: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, padded, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.

name: Regular Fit Yoga hoodie
description: Yoga hoodie in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising with four-way stretch for maximum comfort and added mobility. Mesh-lined, wrapover hood and discreet pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams and with an elasticated panel at the cuffs.

name: Sports top Muscle Fit
description: Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

name: Faux shearling sports gilet
description: Sports gilet in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the armholes and hem.

name: Base layer top
description: Long-sleeved base layer top in soft, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric.

name: Water-repellent jacket
description: Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers and protect you from the wind. Padded hood with an elastic drawstring at the front and a tab with a fastener at the back for a snug and comfy fit. Zip down the front with a chin guard, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and front pockets with a concealed zip. Cuffs with covered elastication and a tab with a hook and loop fastening, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem for an adjustable fit. Lined.

name: Sports top Muscle Fit
description: Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

name: Water-repellent padded jacket
description: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric made partly from recycled polyester. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front, handwarmer and side pockets, both with a concealed zip and a zipped inner pocket. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined and filled with recycled polyester.

name: Sports top Regular Fit
description: Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

name: Running jacket Regular Fit
description: Running jacket in textured, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and long sleeves with thumbholes and tape-trimmed cuffs. Gently rounded at the back.

name: Sports top Loose Fit
description: Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

name: Long-sleeved sports top
description: Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Slim Fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

name: Sports top Muscle Fit
description: Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.

name: Hooded sports jacket
description: Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

name: Fleece jacket
description: Jacket in soft fleece with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes, mesh-lined side pockets and a small reflective print on the chest. Unlined.

name: Running top Regular Fit
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

name: Water-repellent trousers
description: Outdoor trousers in water-repellent nylon with a fast-drying function. Covered elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist, zipped diagonal side pockets and flap leg pockets. Zip at the knees to convert the trousers to shorts.

name: Sports top Loose Fit
description: Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

name: Water-repellent car coat
description: Car coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a collar, mesh-lined, loose yoke at the back and taped zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and fastener at the cuffs, ventilation holes with eyelets under the sleeves and a reflective print on one sleeve. Single back vent. Lining with taped seams.

name: Running top Regular Fit
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

name: Sports shorts
description: Sports shorts with four-way stretch in fast-drying functional fabric designed to keep you dry and cool while exercising. Elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets for safe storage of valuables, and slits in the sides for increased mobility.

name: Hooded sports jacket
description: Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

name: Track jacket Regular Fit
description: Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

name: Sports hoodie Muscle Fit
description: Zip-through sports hoodie in stretch jersey for both indoor and outdoor exercise. Mesh-lined hood, a zip down the front and long sleeves in a raglan cut for a flattering fit over the shoulders and chest. Pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
composition: Hood lining: Polyester 100%Shell: Cotton 64%, Polyester 31%, Elastane 5%

name: Sporty popover jacket
description: Popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Mesh-lined hood, a zip at the top with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket with a zip at each side, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Mesh lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

name: Sports top Loose Fit
description: Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

name: Sports top Loose Fit
description: Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

name: Windproof parka
description: Padded parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Fleece-lined hood with a concealed elastic drawstring and a two-way zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets with a zip, fleece-lined front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Fleece lining. The parka has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.

name: Sporty hooded jacket
description: Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.

name: Base layer top
description: Long-sleeved base layer top in, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric.

name: Water-repellent outdoor jacket
description: Quilted outdoor puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers and protect you from the wind. Hood with an elasticated drawstring for an adjustable fit, a zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a zipped inner pocket for safe storage of small items. Narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and a concealed elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer and lining is recycled.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture and help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.

name: Track jacket Regular Fit
description: Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

name: Regular Fit Running top
description: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.

name: Water-repellent popover jacket
description: Popover jacket in water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers. Stand-up collar, a zip at the top with a tab and zipped fronted pockets for safe storage of valuables. Covered elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated drawstring at the hem for an adjustable fit, and a concealed zip at one side. Lined.

name: Padded outdoor jacket
description: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, padded, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.

name: Softshell jacket
description: Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

name: Track jacket Regular Fit
description: Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

name: 5-pack sports socks
description: No-show trainer socks in fast-drying, functional yarn. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a concealed silicone trim around the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.

name: 2-pack COOLMAX® T-shirts
description: Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

name: Water-repellent parka
description: Parka in water-repellent functional fabric designed to keep you dry during light showers. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring to help the hood stay in place, a zip down the front and wind flap with hook and loop fastenings. Yoke at the back with a ventilation panel, zipped chest pockets and flap front pockets with hook and loop fastenings for safe storage of small items. Adjustable tab at the cuffs to keep the wind out. Single back vent and an elastic drawstring at the hem for an adjustable fit. Partly lined.
composition: Lining: Polyester 100%Shell: Polyester 91%, Elastane 9%Hood lining: Polyester 100%

name: Fleece jacket
description: Jacket in soft fleece with a fast-drying function to help keep you dry and cool outdoors. Can be worn as a jacket or mid layer with other garments. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard, and side pockets and a chest pocket with a zip for easy access to safely stored valuables. Some of the polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

name: Sports jacket
description: Sports jacket with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
